thread.section_title: DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location - Review
thread.title_full: Good location - Review of DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Stephanie r
title: Good location - Review
text: This hotel is good for families due to the size of the rooms. Bathrooms had two vanities which is nice when traveling with teenagers. microwave and mini fridge are provided. I agree it could use some updating but as far as comfort goes it was very comfortable. We were on the16th floor and could not hear any street noise. Loved the pub around the corner. Will come back.
